thread.section_title: Vodafone Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vodafone Ireland | www.vodafone.ie
thread.title: Margaret Sullivan
thread.title_full: Vodafone Ireland reviewed by Margaret Sullivan

author: Margaret Sullivan
title: Margaret Sullivan
text: In December 2015 I signed up for Vodafone wireless internet, everything was going fine with the odd glitch ie: no internet some days, maybe an hour each night, fast forward January 2017 NO internet most nights if I'm lucky I get an hour each night. I don't know why I pay 20 eu a month for sh--e coverage. I live in Kerry yet I very seldom have a problem with mobile phone coverage. My belief is if you don't use it, you lose it. I still have to pay 20 eu every 28 days, no concessions from this company. I rate this company 1 star. If they don't improve I will be changing to another provider.
